alert.note: Alert for Cass; Richland; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued June 24 at 6:18PM CDT until June 24 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 371, PREVIOUSLY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING, IS NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN MINNESOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 12 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MINNESOTA WADENA IN NORTH CENTRAL MINNESOTA HUBBARD IN NORTHWEST MINNESOTA BECKER CLEARWATER MAHNOMEN NORMAN PENNINGTON POLK RED LAKE IN WEST CENTRAL MINNESOTA CLAY OTTER TAIL WILKIN IN NORTH DAKOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST NORTH DAKOTA CASS RICHLAND TRAILL THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ADA, BAGLEY, BRECKENRIDGE, CLEARBROOK, CROOKSTON, DETROIT LAKES, EAST GRAND FORKS, FARGO, FERGUS FALLS, HALSTAD, HATTON, HILLSBORO, MAHNOMEN, MAYVILLE, MENAHGA, MOORHEAD, NAYTAHWAUSH, PARK RAPIDS, PORTLAND, RED LAKE FALLS, THIEF RIVER FALLS, TWIN VALLEY, WADENA, WAHPETON, AND WAUBUN.
